verses.roman:
tāṅra līlā varṇiyāchena vṛndāvana-dāsa
yebā avaśiṣṭa, āge kariba prakāśa

synonyms: tāṅra—his; līlā—pastimes; varṇiyāchena—described; vṛndāvana-dāsa—Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura; yebā—whatever; avaśiṣṭa—remained undescribed; āge—later in the book; kariba—I shall make; prakāśa—manifest.
translation: Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura vividly described the pastimes of Haridāsa Ṭhākura in his Caitanya-bhāgavata. Whatever has remained undescribed I shall try to explain later in this book.
